text: Krzysztof Tylkowski (born 25 February 1988) is a Polish bobsledder. He competed in the two-man event at the 2018 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male bobsledders Category:Olympic bobsledders of Poland Category:Bobsledders at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Poznań
title: Krzysztof Tylkowski
